name: Mellon 1v1
description:
Mellon 1v1 is a Fighting 'Shoot 'em up' game. It involves mellons, lots of mellons, a flood of mellons!! Earn coins in practice mode to upgrade your weapon for multiplayer mode, careful, if you die you lose coins!

There are no purchases available that involve real money.

Donate and buy DLC's to support future development, it would be greatly appreciated! :)

Have Fun!!

- the Zen Hap team!
